thread.title: NYC council speaker to dedicate immigration speech to Trump
thread.title_full: NYC council speaker to dedicate immigration speech to Trump - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: NYC council speaker to dedicate immigration speech to Trump
text:
Kevin C. Downs/for New York Daily News Mark-Viverito, who has endorsed Hillary Clinton for President, is being honored at the New American Leaders Project 2015 Power and Policy Conference on Friday. She’s giving the keynote address. JAY PAUL/REUTERS Melissa Mark-Viverito said she is dedicating an upcoming immigration speech to Donald Trump because his harsh talk on immigrants will bring out voters against him. Previous Next Enlarge She's doing it for The Donald.
City Council Speaker Melissa Mark-Viverito said Thursday she is dedicating an upcoming immigration speech to Donald Trump — because his harsh talk on immigrants will bring out voters against him.
TWITTER REACTS TO DONALD TRUMP'S BIZARRE 2016 ANNOUNCEMENT
“Thanks to his lovely anti-immigrant rhetoric, his misogyny, his bigotry, he’s really galvanizing and mobilizing and energizing immigrant communities,” she said with a smirk. “So my speech will be dedicated to him.”
Mark-Viverito, who has endorsed Hillary Clinton for President, is being honored at the New American Leaders Project 2015 Power and Policy Conference on Friday. She’s giving the keynote address.
Related Stories Trump, Carson threaten to boycott next GOP debate Donald Trump supporters spits on Latino protester at rally Trump University was ‘classic’ fraud, says prosecutor
